Epic Games (www.epicgames.com) | Systems Engineers or Developers | Greater Seattle and Raleigh areas | ONSITE

Founded in 1991, Epic Games is the creator of the Unreal, Gears of War and Infinity Blade series of games. Today Epic is building Paragon, Fortnite, Robo Recall, Battle Breakers, SPYJiNX and the new Unreal Tournament. Epicâ€™s Unreal Engine technology brings high-fidelity, interactive experiences to PC, console, mobile, VR and the Web. Unreal Engine is freely available at unrealengine.com.

We're looking for a variety of folks to help us build, operate and innovate for our online platform that powers our games. Unreal Engine and Unreal Tournament are both open source on GitHub.
